t: r/amazon on Reddit: Why does Amazon allow identical products with different brand names?

s: If the picture is for a completely different item - different title - then use the product page to report the incorrect image. I find I get better service reporting it that way in order to get the image removed. Amazon just puts up one of their generic images.
